name: Centre Court Tennis
description:
Centre Court Tennis is a tennis game for the Nintendo 64 released in 1999 in Europe. It was released under the name Let's Smash (Let's スマッシュ) in Japan in 1998.
Challenge unique courts loaded with various tricks and obstacles! Enjoy the excitement of these lighthearted yet challenging courts! Increase the strength and ability of your players by collecting different items! Battle opponents in fierce competition to capture even more items! Acquire even further items in the MINI GAMES that get really exciting before you knowit! Put your skills to the test on a variety of courts against a variety of players!
